tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Electronic_Recycling (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    weight DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    materials_recovered TEXT NOT NULL,
    recycling_facility VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE electronic_items (
  item_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  item_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  weight DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  material_recovered VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  recycling_facility VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE RecyclingItems (
  item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  item_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  weight FLOAT NOT NULL,
  materials_recovered TEXT,
  recycling_facility VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ElectronicItems (
  item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  item_name VARCHAR(255),
  weight DECIMAL,
  materials_recovered TEXT,
  recycling_facility VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE RecyclingProcesses (
  process_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  item_id INT,
  facility_id INT,
  process_date DATE,
  weight_recycled DECIMAL
);
